content: Which famous Italian explorer, credited with discovering America in 1492, completed four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean under the patronage of the Spanish Crown?

You're referring to Christopher Columbus, the renowned Italian explorer who embarked on four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean, sponsored by the Spanish Crown. His initial expedition in 1492 aimed to find a western sea route to Asia but instead led to the discovery of the Americas, marking a significant turning point in world history.
